headline.main: British Man Shot to Death in Kenya During Ranch Invasion
headline.print_headline: British Man Shot to Death in Kenya During Ranch Invasion

lead_paragraph: A British man was shot to death by pastoral herders in central Kenya who have been invading large farms, some of which double as wildlife conservation areas, officials said Sunday.
snippet: A British man was shot to death by pastoral herders in central Kenya who have been invading large farms, some of which double as wildlife conservation areas, officials said Sunday....
